room_title: Escape room "Space Station Tiberia VR" by No Escape Room in Chicago
room_address: 1501 W Dundee Rd #102, Buffalo Grove, IL 60089
room_description:
The No Escape Room in Buffalo Grove is excited to be the first in Chicago land to introduce the Virtual Realty (VR) escape room that offers fully immersive experience. 

When you enjoy VR in the same physical space you get a richer more satisfying social experience. Our VR experiences encourage social connections via the technology itself as well as through the types of activities you participate in within the game.
